datacenter.zeitreihen
Class Computation

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--datacenter.persistent.Persistent
        |
        +--datacenter.zeitreihen.Computation
public class Computation
extends Persistent

Computation represent specific timeseries for a channel.

See Also:
Channel, TimeserieWrapper

Computation

                   java.lang.String descr,
                   TimeserieWrapper wrap,
                   Channel channel)
constructor for creating a new Computation

Parameters:
name - name of the Computation
descr - some description
wrap - TimeserieWrapper of the source of this computation, that is on which this computation will base on.
channel - the Channel that owns this computation
